StorageAccountSettings.ConnectionString: [YOUR AZURE STORAGE ACCOUNT SAS THAT USUALLY STARTS WITH DefaultEndpointsProtocol]

ConnectionStrings.AzureSqlConnection: Data Source=[YOUR AZURE SQL SERVER ADDRESS]
ConnectionStrings.WindowsSqlConnection: Data Source=[YOUR SQL SERVER 2016 SERVER ADDRESS]
ConnectionStrings.LinuxSqlConnection: Data Source=[YOUR SQL SERVER FOR LINUX SERVER ADDRESS]
ConnectionStrings.FallbackConnection: Data Source=[YOUR AZURE SQL SERVER ADDRESS]
